articles.title: California Power Outages: Fire Danger Prompts Utility to Cut Electricity
articles.description: An intentional shut-off by Pacific Gas & Electric, the largest utility in the state, could affect as many as 800,000 customers.

articles.author: Faith Karimi and LaRell Reynolds, CNN
articles.title: Montgomery elected its first black mayor in 200 years. This is why it matters
articles.description: In the two centuries since its founding, Alabama's capital of Montgomery and the birthplace of the civil rights movement has never had a black mayor. Until Tuesday.
articles.content:
Montgomery, Alabama (CNN)In the two centuries since its founding, Alabama's capital of Montgomery and the birthplace of the civil rights movement has never had a black mayor.

articles.title: Johnson faces cabinet revolt over no-deal Brexit - media
articles.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson is facing a fresh rebellion in his cabinet, with a group of ministers poised to resign due to concerns that he is leading the country towards a no-deal Brexit, The Times newspaper reported on Wednesday.
